com.application.components.TEITextStruct

Class TextNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.application.components.TEITextStruct.TextNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TextNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is for registering a single node storing a TEI label with its label name, child label nodes, attributes and inner text.
    Author:
    Miguel Urízar Salinas
    See Also:
    TextStruct, Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Stores the attributes

      Stores the text at the beginning of the label until a new child label appears

      Stores the TEI validation error that can have the node

      Stores the unique identifier name

      • TextNode

        public TextNode(java.lang.String label,
        java.lang.String text,
        int identifierNumber)
        Constructor for a new label node that does not have children
        Parameters:
        label - Label name of the new node
        text - Inside text to insert in the label
        identifierNumber - Unique number to identify the node

      • TextNode

        public TextNode(java.lang.String label,
        java.lang.String text,
        int identifierName,
        java.util.ArrayList<TextMiddleNode> labels)
        Constructor for a new label node that has children
        Parameters:
        label - Label name of the new node
        text - Text placed at the beginning of the label
        identifierName - Unique number to identify the node
        labels - Array of TextMiddleNodes that represent the child nodes of the new Label node

        Constructor for creating an empty node

      • GenerateInnerHTML

        public java.lang.String GenerateInnerHTML(boolean rootNode)
        Generates the inner HTML of this node.
        Returns:
        String with the inner HTML for showing the node

      • GenerateInnerXML

        public java.lang.String GenerateInnerXML(int depth)
        Generates an XML fragment using this Node.
        Returns:
        String with the inner XML of the node

      • AddModifyAttribute

        public int AddModifyAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Inserts an attribute and its value.

        If the attribute already exists, it is modified with the new value.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the attribute to modify or create.
        value - Value of the attribute to insert or modify.
        Returns:
        0 if attribute is correctly inserted or updated or -1 if it was impossible to insert it

      • AddLabel

        public int AddLabel(java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String value,
           int parent,
           int identifier,
           java.lang.String afterText)
        Creates a new Label in the parent defined.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the new label
        value - inner text of the new label
        parent - parent identifier whewre the node is inserted
        identifier - Identifier number for the new label to add
        afterText - Text that goes after the new label
        Returns:
        0 if node added successfully and -1 if there was an error.

      • AddModifyAttributes

        public int AddModifyAttributes(AttributeSenderStruct[] attributesToSend,
                      int id)
        Inserts or deletes a list of attributes to the label defined by id.
        Parameters:
        attributesToSend - List of attributes modified to update
        id - Id of the node to insert the attributes
        Returns:
        0 if success, -1 if node does not exist or the number of attributes that generated error.

      • ModifyBeginningText

        public int ModifyBeginningText(java.lang.String newText,
                      int id)
        Changes the beginning text of the label defined by id.
        Parameters:
        newText - Text to update
        id - Identification number of the node to change the text
        Returns:
        0 if success or -1 if node does not exist

      • ModifyEndingText

        public int ModifyEndingText(java.lang.String newText,
                   int id)
        Changes the ending text of the label defined by id.
        Parameters:
        newText - Text to update
        id - Identification number of the node to change the text
        Returns:
        0 if success or -1 if node does not exist

      • ChangeLabel

        public int ChangeLabel(int labelId,
              java.lang.String newLabelName)
        Changes the label name defined by id.
        Parameters:
        labelId - Label identification to change the id
        newLabelName - New name for the label
        Returns:
        0 if success or -1 if node does not exist

      • RemoveLabel

        public int RemoveLabel(int id)
        Removes the label with selected id.
        Parameters:
        id - Identification number for the label to remove
        Returns:
        0 if success or -1 if node does not exist and 1 if is needed to change this node

      • CreateLabel

        public int CreateLabel(int parentId,
              java.lang.String newLabelName,
              int beginTextId,
              int beginTextOffset,
              int endTextId,
              int endTextOffset,
              int newLabelId)
        Creates a new label with the selected text offsets defined, it changes automatically child nodes.
        Parameters:
        parentId - Identification number for the parent Label where the child node will be created
        newLabelName - Name of the new label to be generated.
        beginTextId - Id of the label related to the afterText where the new label starts. -1 implies that the new label starts in the innerText of the parent node.
        beginTextOffset - Offset where the text starts.
        endTextId - Id of the label related to the afterText where the new label ends. -1 implies that the new label ends in the innerText of the parent node.
        endTextOffset - Offset where the text ends.

      • GetChildNode

        private int GetChildNode(int childId)
        Get the position in innerLabels of a defined node.

        If the node is not a child node, a -1 is returned.

        Parameters:
        childId - Identification number of the child node to search
        Returns:
        Number of node or -1 if selected id is not a child node

      • FillNodeFromFile

        public int FillNodeFromFile(org.w3c.dom.Node DOMNode,
                   int nodeNumber)
        Function to read an xml file and create this node.

        It has to fulfill the XML requirements

        Parameters:
        DOMNode - Node represented in the DOM parser
        nodeNumber - Node identifier that has this new node
        Returns:
        Number of nodes that are included in the structure after parsing this node or -1 if there was a problem.

      • validateXMLNode

        public int validateXMLNode(FileManager manager)
        Validates the node with the XML structure and stores the errors in the node if there are.
        Parameters:
        manager - of the TEI structure
